'''Dr. Donald Ledbetter''' is [[Ross Geller|Ross]]' boss at the museum. It is revealed that he ate Ross' leftover Thanksgiving sandwich, for which Ross gets really mad at him. He then lets Ross take a sabbatical. However, while he visits Ross to ask him to come back to work at the museum, Ross discovers that [[Monica Geller|Monica]] and [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] are in a relationship and he gets mad again, for which Ross gets fired.
